dialogue.htmlContent:
[style.boldBrown(Dominion Express)]
Looking at the business card given to you by Natalya, you see that the delivery company which employs her as a 'Stable Mistress' is very near to where you're currently standing, and is open to visiting members of the public between the hours of #IF(pc.isQuestFailed(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) [unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)]. As Natalya had you thrown out and banned from ever returning to Dominion Express, there's nothing for you to do there... #ELSEIF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) #IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) [style.colourMinorGood([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As you're a qualified filly, you're free to come and go at any time of the day, and you wonder whether you should head inside and service some of the centaur slaves... #ELSE [style.colourMinorGood([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which Dominion Express operates is currently [style.colourGood(open)], you could head inside and see if you could arrange to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ENDIF #ELSEIF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) [style.colourMinorBad([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As you're a qualified filly, the opening times don't apply to you, and even though Natalya won't be present at this hour, you could still head inside and service some of the centaur slaves... #ELSE [style.colourMinorBad([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which Dominion Express operates is currently [style.colourBad(closed)], you'll have to come back during opening hours if you wanted to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ENDIF

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR

[pc.Walking] up to the huge warehouse from which Dominion Express operates, you push open the front door and [pc.step] into the entrance hall. Partitioned from the main floor of the warehouse by an internal wall, this area is furnished to act as both a reception and waiting room. Several sofas and chairs are arrayed in rows on one side of this large room #IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) , and sitting upon them are a couple of businessmen waiting to meet with the company's representatives. #ELSE , but due to the fact that the warehouse is currently closed to members of the public, they're completely deserted. #ENDIF Over on the opposite side of the room, there's a very long counter running parallel to the wall, which acts as the first port of call for anyone visiting Dominion Express.

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) Despite its size, however, this counter only has three employees sitting behind it, all of whom are smartly-dressed horse-girls. Noticing your entry, the nearest one breaks off from gossiping with her colleagues and turns to face you. #ELSE Due to the fact that the warehouse is closed to the public at this hour, there's only a single smartly-dressed horse-girl sitting behind the counter. Noticing your entry, she stifles a yawn and turns to face you. #ENDIF #IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA) && collar!=null && collar.getClothingType().getId().equals("innoxia_neck_filly_choker")) Noticing the fact that you're wearing a filly collar, she waves you through and says, [style.speechFeminine(Go on though, filly. I'm sure there are plenty of slaves waiting for you in the stables...)] #ELSEIF(pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) Not wanting to be delayed, you've already got your stamped business card out, and as you show it to the receptionist, she waves you past and says, #IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) [style.speechFeminine(Go on though. I'm sure Natalya is waiting to see you...)] #ELSE [style.speechFeminine(Natalya's gone home for the day, but you can still go on through if you want...)] #ENDIF #ELSE Beckoning you forwards, she asks in a very bored voice, [style.speechFeminine(Good [style.afternoon], [pc.sir]. How can I help you?)] #ENDIF

You [pc.walk] over to the receptionist and show her Natalya's business card, before saying that the [natalya.race] has asked for you to pay her a visit. Raising her eyebrows in surprise, the receptionist points over to the double doors which lead into the main warehouse, saying, [style.speechFeminine(You shouldn't keep Mistress Natalya waiting; go right on through.)]

Putting the business card away, you [pc.step] away from the counter and prepare to do as the horse-girl says...

Partitioned from the main floor of the warehouse by an internal wall, this entrance hall is furnished to act as both a reception and waiting room. Several sofas and chairs are arrayed in rows on one side of this large room #IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) , and sitting upon them are a couple of businessmen waiting to meet with the company's representatives. #ELSE , but due to the fact that the warehouse is currently closed to members of the public, they're completely deserted. #ENDIF Over on the opposite side of the room, there's a very long counter running parallel to the wall, which acts as the first port of call for anyone visiting Dominion Express.

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) Despite its size, however, this counter only has three employees sitting behind it, all of whom are smartly-dressed horse-girls. Having already granted you access to the main warehouse, these receptionists don't pay you any attention, and simply continue to gossip amongst themselves. #ELSE Due to the fact that the warehouse is closed to the public at this hour, there's only a single smartly-dressed horse-girl sitting behind the counter. Having already granted you access to the main warehouse, she doesn't pay you any attention, and instead continues to file her nails and stifle the occasional yawn. #ENDIF

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR

This wide, wooden-floored corridor cuts a direct path from one end of the warehouse to the other. While one side of this corridor is flanked by a solid wall, the other opens out onto a vast storage area, which is filled with stacks of crates, piles of furniture, and shelves stacked full of books.

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) As you [pc.walk] down the corridor, you find yourself passing several centaur or centauress slaves, each of whom appears to be either delivering or picking up cargo. While most of them are carrying the goods on their backs, there's the occasional one or two whose cargo is so heavy or bulky that they're having to use a cart to pull it along. #ELSE Despite the hour of day, you find yourself passing the occasional centaur or centauress slave on your way down the corridor. Unlike in daylight hours, however, these slaves don't seem to be picking up or dropping off cargo, and instead appear to be tasked with reorganising the goods already stored here. #ENDIF #IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA) && collar!=null && collar.getClothingType().getId().equals("innoxia_neck_filly_choker")) Catching sight of your filly collar, these centaurs hungrily stare at you as you pass, #IF(pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true)) and you realise that [style.colourPink(it's only a matter of time before one of them tries to make you service them)]. #ELSE but [style.colourBad(as you can't access your mouth, none of them will try to make you service them)]. #ENDIF #ELSE Not having any business with you, these centaurs pay you no attention as you pass, allowing you to continue on your way through the warehouse without delay. #ENDIF

In addition to these manual labourers, you rarely catch sight of much smaller centauresses happily trotting to and from the stables at the end of the corridor, each one wearing a choker displaying the word 'filly' in bronze or, far less commonly, silver letters. These small, busty fillies pay you absolutely no attention as they pass, as they only seem interested in the nearby slaves.

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR

Dominion Express is not only in the business of cargo haulage, but also operates a highly-successful storage service. The vast majority of their warehouse's floor area is set aside for this purpose, and is home to countless crates, pieces of furniture, and book-shelves.

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) As you [pc.walk] through the labyrinth-like aisles formed by these stacks of stored goods, you find yourself passing the occasional centaur or centauress slave. #ELSE It's through the labyrinth-like aisles formed by these stacks of stored goods which you're currently [pc.walking], and despite the hour of day, you find yourself passing the occasional centaur or centauress slave. #ENDIF #IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA) && collar!=null && collar.getClothingType().getId().equals("innoxia_neck_filly_choker")) Noticing the filly collar around your neck, these centaurs make lewd comments as you pass, #IF(pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true)) and you realise that [style.colourPink(it's only a matter of time before one of them tries to make you service them)]. #ELSE but [style.colourBad(as you can't access your mouth, none of them will try to make you service them)]. #ENDIF #ELSE Not having any business with you, these centaurs pay you no attention as you pass, allowing you to continue on your way through the storage area uninterrupted. #ENDIF

In addition to these manual labourers, you rarely catch sight of much smaller centauresses happily trotting around, each one wearing a choker displaying the word 'filly' in bronze or, far less commonly, silver letters. These small, busty fillies pay you absolutely no attention as they pass, as they only seem interested in the nearby slaves.

A business the size of Dominion Express inevitably generates a huge amount of paperwork, and it's in the office before you that all that tedious bureaucratic work is handled. Although the 'Administrative Staff Only' sign on the door makes it clear that you're not allowed inside, you can still take a look through the large glass windows to see a dozen or so workers filling out forms or planning deliveries.

As you're not permitted to enter this office, there's little for you to do except turn around and head back into the warehouse...

On one side of the long corridor which runs through the warehouse, there's a small alcove, which is just about large enough to comfortably accommodate a single centaur. Stepping into this recess, you find yourself coming face-to-face with what looks to be some kind of vending machine, which is proudly displaying the words 'Filly Rewards Station'. Looking through its clear glass frontage, you see that there are a large selection of transformative potions on offer, but instead of their prices being displayed in flames, they're each marked as costing a certain number of 'filly points'.

Beside this curious vending machine, you see that there's an informative poster titled 'Filly Rewards Scheme'. If you wanted to, you could spend a moment reading over the information displayed on this poster, or perhaps instead you could try interacting with the filly rewards station...

Turning your attention towards the flashy informative poster, you read:

[style.boldPinkLight(Filly Rewards Scheme)]

Welcome to the Filly Rewards Station, filly! In case you've forgotten how things work, here's a quick recap for you:
- Centaur slaves earn [style.colourPinkLight(filly points)] by working hard!
- They can give you these [style.colourPinkLight(filly points)] in exchange for your sexual services!

By signing your filly contract, you have agreed that Dominion Express cannot be held liable for any adverse effects experienced by consuming transformation potions. This points-based reward system can not be legally recognised as setting a precedent of paying fillies a salary. Dominion Express cannot be held liable for any complications arising from the use of this machine. If you would like to register a complaint, please see Mistress Natalya.

Turning your attention towards the items on offer behind the machine's glass window, you notice that there's only one of each type of transformative potion on display, and unlike a vending machine, there doesn't seem to be any mechanism via which these bottles can be dispensed.

Clearly housing some kind of arcane instrument that's automatically detected your presence, the machine suddenly lets out a high-pitched beep, before projecting a series of coloured words into the air:

[style.italicsCrimson(No filly choker detected!)]
[style.italicsCrimson(Please step back and make room for a qualified filly to make use of this machine!)]
